title: Interactive Valentine-themed 5-question love quiz with playful results and Valentine trick

requirements.text: Create a mobile-first, single-page interactive Valentine quiz experience with a consistent romantic pastel visual theme (soft pinks, beige, blush, red accents), rounded card UI, subtle animations, smooth transitions, and playful micro-interactions; keep performance fast and the overall tone loving, funny, slightly teasing, extremely cute and romantic.

quotes: Create a very aesthetic, romantic, fun and playful interactive web experience for my wife.
It should be a cute 5-question MCQ love quiz with soft romantic UI, pastel colours, hearts, subtle animations, smooth transitions and playful micro-interactions.
The tone should be: Loving, Funny, Slightly teasing, Extremely cute and romantic
Extra UI / UX Requirements: Soft pastel gradients, Floating hearts in background, Cute rounded cards, Mobile-first responsive design, Keep it simple, fast, and very romantic

acceptanceCriteria: All screens share a cohesive romantic pastel theme with consistent typography, spacing, and component styling (no default/unstyled pages).
UI is responsive and usable on small mobile screens without horizontal scrolling.
Transitions between screens/questions feel smooth (no abrupt layout jumps).

requirements.text: Add optional audio: gentle background music and subtle sound effects for key interactions (e.g., start quiz, selecting an option, correct answer celebration, confetti). Provide a clear UI control to mute/unmute; default must be muted until the user explicitly enables audio.
acceptanceCriteria: A user-visible toggle exists to enable/disable audio.

requirements.text: Provide a shareable link experience with no login required: the app should be accessible via URL without authentication, and the URL should be stable and shareable (no requirement to preserve quiz progress across devices, but the app must load directly into the experience when opened).
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the app in an incognito window works without any login flow.
Copying and sharing the app URL opens the same app experience successfully.

requirements.text: Include the required generated meme/illustration images as static assets and render them in the relevant result screens; store generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve images through the backend).

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and load correctly in the built app.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
No login required (do not add Internet Identity authentication gates).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose UI using those components instead.
Backend must remain single-actor if used; avoid adding extra services or external databases.
nonGoals: No requirement to store quiz results persistently on-chain or across sessions.
No requirement for user accounts, profiles, or authentication.
No requirement for real-time multiplayer, chat, or external API integrations.
